cp_version.description: Function - Returns ClassicPress version e.g 1.0.0. It is the recommended way for a plugin or theme to determine whether it is running under ClassicPress.

cp_if_version.description: Conditional to check if ClassicPress version function - classicPress_version() is available.

cp_is_dev_install.description: Function - Returns whether ClassicPress is running as a source repository / development installation

cp_dev_version_info.description: Returns information about the ClassicPress source version in use, if any

cp_version_short.description: Function - Returns the ClassicPress version number without any prerelease version or other metadata

cp_asset_version.description: Function that provides a common code path for specifying and modifying script and stylesheet version numbers / cache busters

cp_user_agent.description: Function that provides a common code path for the User-Agent header value of outgoing HTTP requests

display_plugins_categories_list.description: Function to display a new Categories tab in the plugins installation section

cp_dashboard_petitions.description: Function to display ClassicPress petitions in the dashboard

cp_dashboard_petitions_output.description: Function to display ClassicPress petitions in the dashboard
